name: Tini design system
description:
The Tiki's Tini Apps design team builds a design system for the Tini App platform based on the Tiki design system. The Tini will help product designers to uniform the user interfaces to focus on a better user experience, deliver ideas and products faster.


If you have questions or suggestions you can reach out to us on the Tini Design community or read our Vietnamese design topics at Facebook & Instagram


v2.6

May 31st, 2022


Hi everyone, this month is all about the new auto layout of Figma. Thanks to the powerful features (absolute position and individual stroke) Now, we can make some components more effortless to use than before.

There are those improved components:

- Button bar

- Text field

- Date field

- Textarea

- Combo field

- Slider

- Navigation bar

- Sidebar

- Badge

- Tabs

- Bottom bar

- Carousel

- Bottom sheet


Next month, we will explore the component properties to improve our Tini design system.

See you soon.
